column5: # Section describing configuration of Gene Expression libraries only
# Path of folder containing 10x-compatible reference. Required for gene expression and Feature Barcode libraries.

column6: declaring probe constructs and associated barcodes. Required.

column5: # Include all non-deprecated probes listed in the probe set reference CSV file. Probes that are predicted to have off-target activity to homologous genes are excluded from analysis by default. Setting filter-probes to false will result in UMI counts from all non-deprecated probes
column6: including those with predicted off-target activity
column7: to be used in the analysis. Probes whose ID is prefixed with DEPRECATED are always excluded from the analysis. Default: true. Optional.

column6: saving disk space at the expense of interrogable alignment records. Default: false.

column5: # Table describing the input sequencing libraries. Must contain the header and 1 or more rows. Required.
